page.title: 07Village Policeman, Mawdesley
page.content: Our village policeman is called P.C. Dale. We went to talk to him at the Police Station in the village. He has to patrol the villages of Mawdesley, Eccleston and Rufford. The last policeman stayed here for two years, but there is no set period of time for length of service. When P.C. Dale is not on duty, the policeman from Croston or Eccleston looks after the village. He owns his own car but the police service pays for his petrol. He works under two police sergeants in Coppull. The main crimes in this area are wilful damage caused by young people and the occasional burglary committed by people from outside the area. If an arrest is made, the person is taken to Chorley and appears at the Magistrates Court. P.C. Dale hopes to stay here a long time.
